description: A React component for a dynamic pricing page in a Next.js application. It allows users to input parameters like base price, demand factor, and competitor price, and fetches a recommended price from an API or provides a placeholder calculation on failure.

methods.name: PricingPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders a dynamic pricing interface with state management, user inputs, and API interaction.

methods.name: compute
methods.description: Asynchronous function triggered by button click to fetch recommended price based on user inputs.
